definition: to see a doctor/to seek medical advice

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning

sentences.english: The median age of hospitalized patients in California was 27.
sentences.chinese: 加州就診患者的年齡中值爲27歲。

sentences.english: One of them is how to comprehend the "serious hurt".
sentences.chinese: 其中就有對“嚴重損害就診人身體健康”的非難。

sentences.english: Has the patient ever had the same or similar symptoms(s) before?
sentences.chinese: 就診者以前曾否患有同類或類似病徵？

sentences.english: Another was a 15-year-old girl with many light brown or blue-grey papules on the forehead for over 3 years.
sentences.chinese: 因額部淡褐色或青灰色丘疹並逐漸增多3年餘就診。

sentences.english: Aprimary extranasopharyngeal angiofibroma is area, A22-year-old man sought medical advice due to repeated nasal hemorrhage and stuffy nose.
sentences.chinese: 患者爲22歲男性，因反覆性大量鼻出血及鼻塞就診。

sentences.english: How long, in your opinion, has the patient suffered from these symptoms?
sentences.chinese: 根據閣下的專業意見，就診者已患有此病徵多長時間？

sentences.english: The patient was referred to our clinic due to suspected anterior encephalocele.
sentences.chinese: 患者因懷疑前部的腦膨出來我處就診。

sentences.english: Consultation rates suggest that children and young people are being affected most.
sentences.chinese: 就診率表明青少年和小孩最易受到流感的影響。

sentences.english: He went to the Sichuan People's Hospital after getting off the plane.
sentences.chinese: 他一下飛機便前往四川人民醫院就診。

sentences.english: A 71-year-old female presented with painless gross hematuria for 2 weeks.
sentences.chinese: 一位71歲女性因無痛性血尿就診。

sentences.english: If you go to a private hospital you must pay.
sentences.chinese: 如果你去一傢俬立醫院就診，你得付費。

sentences.english: The majority of sleep-clinic patients suffer from disorders of excessive sleep or "hypersomnia".
sentences.chinese: 大部分前來就診的病人是因爲過度睡眠，即嗜睡症。

sentences.english: The young man's leg was seriously hurt and hsd to be put into the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 這個可憐的孩子腿受傷嚴重，需要馬上到醫院就診。

sentences.english: The University Hospital provides outpatient care to students with BLCU student I.
sentences.chinese: 留學生患病可憑學生證到校醫院就診。

sentences.english: All patients were admitted with serious hypoproteinemia.
sentences.chinese: 就診時均有明顯的低蛋白血癥。

sentences.english: Also, another bad time to go is change-of-shift time.
sentences.chinese: 另一個糟糕的就診時間是換班時間。

definition: to refer sb to an agency (or hospital etc)/referral
to seek medical treatment/to see a doctor
